description: The Hungarian Mushroom Soup, locally known as gombaleves, is relatively quick to make and primarily a mushroom soup with rich flavors from various ingredients.
ingredients: [{"name": "unsalted butter", "units": "tablespoons", "amount": 4}, {"name": "chopped onions", "units": "cups", "amount": 2}, {"name": "fresh mushrooms", "units": "pound", "amount": 1}, {"name": "dried dill weed", "units": "teaspoons", "amount": 2}, {"name": "paprika", "units": "tablespoon", "amount": 1}, {"name": "soy sauce", "units": "tablespoon", "amount": 1}, {"name": "chicken broth", "units": "cups", "amount": 2}, {"name": "milk", "units": "cup", "amount": 1}, {"name": "all-purpose flour", "units": "tablespoons", "amount": 3}, {"name": "salt", "units": "teaspoon", "amount": 1}, {"name": "ground black pepper", "units": "to taste", "amount": null}, {"name": "lemon juice", "units": "teaspoons", "amount": 2}, {"name": "chopped fresh parsley", "units": "cup", "amount": 0.25}, {"name": "sour cream", "units": "cup", "amount": 0.5}]
instructions: Step 1: Melt the butter over medium heat in a big pot. Step 2: Saute the buttered onions for five minutes. Step 3: Add the chestnuts and saute for another 5 minutes. Stir in the dill, paprika, broth, and soy sauce. Reduce heat for 15 minutes, cover, and simmer. Step 4: In a separate bowl, whisk together the milk and the flour. Pour it into the soup and mix well. Cover and cook for another 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. Step 5: Stir in the salt, ground black pepper, lemon juice, parsley, and sour cream. Step 6: Mix and heat for about 3 to 5 minutes over low heat; do not boil. Serve right away.
